p.d: Angele hopes to find answers in Ana's personal diary, but most of it is illegible. The patients are very disturbed and fear a new tragedy. As Ana continuously appears to her, Angele is disconcerted by Simon, a schizophrenic patient who is also terribly seductive... Directed by: Vincent Lannoo (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Noémie Schmidt (Angele Maury), Béatrice Dalle (Élisabeth Favard), Hippolyte Girardot (Raphaël Santi), Judith El Zein (Alexandra Santi), Samuel Theis (Simon), Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet (Maxime), Mylene Demongeot (Rose), Achille Ridolfi (Louis), Émilie Dequenne (Camille), Scali Delpeyrat (Guillaume), Florence Thomassin (Valérie), Antoine Gouy (Bastien), Jérémy Gillet (Arnaud), Yaël Abecassis (Iris Galmont) Genre: detective Awards: Pyrénées d'Or prize for the best mini-series, audience prize for the best mini-series, 2019 Luchon Festival for Television Creation. Parental guidance: TV-PG
